title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, and embed with local Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLMs, embedders, and chat models.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (renamed to Open-WebUI); markdown, code highlighting, multi-model chats, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API for chat, generate, pull, list, and delete models.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvidia-nim
summary: NVIDIA NIM integration: run Ollama-optimized Llama/Mistral models on RTX/Ada GPUs with TensorRT-LLM.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for end-to-end NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that caches and serves Ollama models across GitHub Actions runners.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate exposing async/await bindings for Ollama generate and chat endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, generate, and streaming APIs; includes Blazor sample app.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: Step-by-step tutorial repo showing how to build a RAG system with Ollama embeddings, LangChain, and Streamlit.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds Ollama-backed AI commands: summarize, translate, rewrite, and Q&A over vault.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama models into channels via mentions or slash commands.

title: ollama-gpu-stack
summary: Experimental repo bundling Ollama with vLLM and GPU-scheduler for multi-model serving on a single GPU.
